#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
   long n, r, temp,z,t,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
   {
   scanf("%ld",&n);
   for(i=n+1;;i++)
  {   r=0;
      temp=i;
   while( temp != 0 )
   {
      r= r * 10;
      r = r + temp%10;
      temp = temp/10;
   }
    if(i==r)
    {
        z=i;
        break;
    }

  }
  printf("%ld\n",z);
   }
return 0;
}
